name: Pizza-Yolo
description:
Pizza-Yolo is a fun local multiplayer. (2-4 Players)

You're trapped in a hot oven with a delicious pizza and your buddies, The goal is to slice the pizza to be the last one on it.

Pizza-Yolo est un jeu multi en local. (2-4 Joueurs )

Vous êtes enfermé dans un four avec une déliceuse pizza et vos copains. Le but est de découper la pizza et d'être le dernier dessus.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Setup / Control

Connect gamepad first

Launch game in 16/9 ratio

A or Square to enter game

Y or Triangle to launch game

Enjoy !

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pizza fight club rules:

#1 Eat pizza !

#2 Pineapple speeds you up.

#3 Cheese patch the pizza holes.

#4 Chorizo is like LSD.

#5 Peppers beams you to Mars.

#6 Cheese bubbles bumps you outside.

#7 Launch game in 16/9 ratio.

More to come... ?
